code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{ShopContext}from"../Context/ShopContext";import Breadcrum from"../Components/Breadcrum/Breadcrum";import ProductDisplay from"../Components/ProductDisplay/ProductDisplay";import DescriptionBox from"../Components/DescriptionBox/DescriptionBox";import RelatedProducts from"../Components/RelatedProducts/RelatedProducts";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Product=function Product(){var _useContext=useContext(ShopContext),products=_useContext.products;var _useParams=useParams(),productId=_useParams.productId;var product=products.find(function(p){return p.id===Number(productId);});if(!product)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading product..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Breadcrum,{product:product}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductDisplay,{product:product}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DescriptionBox,{product:product}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RelatedProducts,{currentId:product.id})]});};export default Product;
